title: In the Serpent's Coils
description: Fairies can be downright dangerous!In the Serpent's Coils marks the debut of Hallowmere, a dark, edgy historical fantasy series that teens won't be able to put down!Ever since her parents died in the Civil War, Corrine's dreams have been filled with fairies warning her of impending peril. When she's sent to live at Falston Manor, Corrine thinks she's escaped the danger stalking her. Instead the dreams grow stronger, just as girls begin disappearing from school.
author: Tiffany Trent
